home.subtitleExplore: Explore our curated collection of authentic Indian traditional items, handcrafted by skilled artisans and brought to you through our innovative e-commerce platform.
home.videoSectionDesc: Watch our artisans create beautiful traditional items using centuries-old techniques passed down through generations.
home.videoStoriesDesc: Watch our skilled artisans create beautiful traditional items using centuries-old techniques. Each piece tells a story of cultural heritage, passed down through generations of master craftsmen.
home.videoFeature2Desc: Meet the skilled craftsmen behind each piece
home.featuredCollectionsDesc: Handpicked traditional items that showcase the rich heritage and exquisite craftsmanship of India.
home.featuredCard1Desc: Exquisite handwoven sarees from different regions of India, each telling a unique story of tradition and craftsmanship.
home.featuredCard2Desc: Beautifully crafted traditional jewelry pieces that reflect the rich cultural heritage and skilled artistry of Indian craftsmen.
home.featuredCard3Desc: Handcrafted pottery and home decor items that bring the essence of Indian tradition into your modern living spaces.
home.bazaarFeatureDesc: Step into a virtual marketplace where you can explore traditional items in an immersive 3D environment, bringing the authentic shopping experience right to your screen.
home.bazaarFeature1Desc: Walk through virtual stalls and interact with products in a realistic 3D environment.
home.bazaarFeature2Desc: Rotate, zoom, and examine products from every angle before making a purchase.
home.bazaarFeature3Desc: Experience the vibrant atmosphere of traditional Indian markets from anywhere in the world.
home.uspDesc: We bridge the gap between traditional craftsmanship and modern convenience, ensuring authentic quality and cultural preservation.
home.usp1Desc: Every item is verified for authenticity and sourced directly from skilled artisans, ensuring genuine traditional craftsmanship.
home.usp2Desc: Each piece is meticulously crafted by master artisans using traditional techniques passed down through generations.
home.usp3Desc: Supporting traditional artisans and preserving India's rich cultural heritage for future generations.
home.howItWorksDesc2: Experience the seamless journey from discovering authentic traditional items to bringing them home.
home.stepDiscoverDesc: Browse our curated collection of authentic traditional items from skilled artisans across India.
home.stepChooseDesc: Select your favorite items and learn about their cultural significance and artisan stories.
home.stepOrderDesc: Place your order with secure payment and enjoy our premium packaging and delivery service.
home.stepEnjoyDesc: Receive your authentic traditional items and become part of preserving India's cultural heritage.
home.ctaDesc: Join thousands of customers who have discovered the beauty of authentic Indian traditional items through KalaMitra.
home.leaderboardDesc: Recognizing our most dedicated customers who support traditional artisans through their purchases.
home.donateFloatingButtonTooltip: Donate items for NGO or Artisans to make best out of it!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: KalaMitra is an AI-powered marketplace connecting talented artisans with buyers worldwide. We celebrate India's cultural heritage by helping artisans showcase their handcrafted products while offering buyers an immersive shopping experience with 3D virtual stalls, AR product visualization, and AI-assisted search.
faq.q2: How do I buy products on KalaMitra?
faq.a2: Simply browse our marketplace, use voice or text search in any Indian language, and explore products. You can view items in AR, read artisan stories, add products to your cart, and checkout securely. Our AI Shopping Assistant is always available to help you find exactly what you're looking for.
faq.q3: How can artisans sell on KalaMitra?
faq.a3: Sign up as a seller, create your personalized virtual stall, and start listing products. Use our AI tools to enhance photos, generate descriptions, and create compelling stories. You can also run auctions, post reels, collaborate with other artisans, and track your performance through detailed analytics‚Äîall for free.
faq.q4: What makes KalaMitra different from other marketplaces?
faq.a4: KalaMitra uniquely combines tradition with technology. We offer 3D virtual bazaars, AR product previews, voice search in multiple Indian languages, AI-powered shopping assistance, story narration for products, custom craft requests, and direct chat with artisans. Every feature is designed to preserve cultural heritage while empowering artisans.
faq.a5: Yes! Creating an account, browsing products, and listing items as a seller is completely free. We support multiple Indian languages, provide AI tools for sellers at no cost, and charge no upfront fees. Our mission is to make authentic handcrafted art accessible to everyone.

aboutUs.title: About KalaMitra
aboutUs.subtitle: Empowering artisans and connecting cultures through technology.
aboutUs.formationBody: KalaMitra began as an inspiring vision by Apoorv Gupta and Mradul Gupta, founders of Team ThinkTech, who decided to solve the real problems artisans face today.
aboutUs.visionBody: In the world of an evolving Aatma Nirbhar Bharat ‚Äì a self-reliant country, a vision ignited by our Hon‚Äôble Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi ‚Äì one thing is clear: India‚Äôs cultural strength lies in the hands of its artisans. But this challenge is not limited to India. Across the world, local artisans face the same struggle.
aboutUs.challengeBody: Whether it‚Äôs about receiving the fair price their craft truly deserves, or depending upon middlemen, local stalls, or seasonal markets, artisans often earn only a fraction of the value of their work. But it‚Äôs not just the makers who struggle‚Äîbuyers are losing out, too. Because the connection is broken, buyers get mass-produced items, and artisans stay sidelined.
aboutUs.solutionBody: That‚Äôs where KalaMitra comes in. KalaMitra is an AI-powered cultural marketplace ‚Äî a digital companion for artisans, buyers, and cultural brands. It removes the biggest barriers to self-reliance. Whether it‚Äôs tackling capital with the opportunity to create and sell virtual products from our own app with zero investment, or creating useful products for selling from donated & leftover items and waste materials!
aboutUs.experienceBody: It‚Äôs not only about artisans. Buyers get a rich, immersive experience through stories, voice interaction, AR visualization, and direct connection with creators.
aboutUs.livingHubBody: Unlike traditional marketplaces, KalaMitra is not static. It‚Äôs a living cultural hub ‚Äî with AI, 3D bazaars, auctions, collaborations, and community features ‚Äî all in one place.
aboutUs.contactBody: For support or queries, contact: talkto.kalamitra@gmail.com
aboutUs.addressText: Moh. Daulatpur, Misrikh, Sitapur, Uttar Pradesh-261401

successStories.title: Voices of KalaMitra
successStories.subtitle: Real stories from artisans and buyers transforming their lives.
successStories.comingSoonDesc: KalaMitra is currently in its prototype phase. Once we are fully live, this space will be filled with the inspiring journeys of our community.

support.title: We‚Äôre Here to Help
support.subtitle: Find answers to common questions or reach out to our team.
support.reportIssuesDesc: Facing a technical bug, seller misconduct, or order discrepancy?

refunds.a: Refunds are processed by the seller after your return is approved. For physical products, you must request a return within 7 days of delivery. Refunds are issued within 5‚Äì7 business days after approval, via the original payment method. Digital products are non-refundable.

payments.a: Sellers receive payments directly to their registered bank account or UPI after a successful sale, minus any platform or payment gateway fees. KalaMitra does not hold or delay your funds.

digital.a: Yes! KalaMitra allows artisans to sell digital creations such as Kolams, templates, and craft designs. Upload your digital product in your seller dashboard.

free.a: Signing up and browsing is free. Sellers may be charged a small commission or service fee per sale, but there are no upfront listing fees.

shipping.a: All shipping and delivery are handled by the individual sellers. Tracking details are provided by the seller once your order is shipped.

auctions.a: Sellers can create live auctions for their products. Buyers can place bids in real time. The highest bidder at auction close wins the product and completes payment.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We're here to help. Reach out to us for any queries, support, or feedback.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.intro: Please read these terms carefully before using our platform.
termsOfService.operatedBy: This website is operated by KalaMitra.
termsOfService.disclaimer: This is a prototype/early-stage platform. By accessing or using this website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, please do not use the platform.
termsOfService.section1Desc1: KalaMitra is a technology facilitator connecting independent artisans (sellers) with buyers. We do not manufacture, own, store, or ship any products. All sales, fulfillment, and shipping are handled directly by the individual sellers listed on the platform.
termsOfService.section1Desc2: KalaMitra is not responsible for the quality, safety, legality, or delivery of products, nor for any disputes or losses arising from transactions. We only provide a platform for direct connection and communication between buyers and sellers.
section2Points: Users must provide accurate information and comply with all applicable laws.
Buyers and sellers are solely responsible for their transactions, communications, and fulfillment of obligations.
Any disputes must be resolved directly between buyer and seller. KalaMitra may provide contact details to facilitate resolution but is not a party to any transaction.
section3Points: Returns accepted within 7 days of delivery for physical products, subject to seller's approval.
Product must be unused, undamaged, and in original condition.
Refunds processed within 5‚Äì7 business days after return approval by the seller.
No returns or refunds for digital products once delivered/downloaded.
For damaged/wrong products, contact the seller within 48 hours of delivery with images/videos.
section4Points: Orders can be cancelled within 24 hours unless shipped. Custom orders cannot be cancelled.
KalaMitra is not liable for indirect damages arising from platform use.
termsOfService.section5Desc: These Terms shall be governed by the laws of India. Jurisdiction: Uttar Pradesh, India.
termsOfService.addressText: Moh. Daulatpur, Misrikh, Sitapur, Uttar Pradesh-261401

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: Your trust is important to us. Learn how we handle your data.
privacyPolicy.section1Desc:
KalaMitra values your privacy. This is a prototype/early-stage platform. We collect only the information necessary to facilitate transactions and improve your experience. Your data is never sold to third parties.

KalaMitra may use basic cookies or analytics tools to improve platform performance and user experience. These do not collect sensitive personal data.

We may collect your name, contact details, and transaction information when you use our platform. This information is used solely to connect buyers and sellers and to provide you with a seamless experience.

KalaMitra does not take responsibility for any actions, omissions, or issues arising from transactions between buyers and sellers. We only provide a platform for direct connection and communication between users. All sales, fulfillment, and shipping are handled by individual sellers listed on the platform.

For any privacy-related queries, contact: talkto.kalamitra@gmail.com
privacyPolicy.section2Desc: We implement reasonable security measures to protect your data. However, KalaMitra is not responsible for any unauthorized access or misuse of your information by third parties, including sellers or other users.
privacyPolicy.section3Desc: Our platform may contain links to third-party websites or services. KalaMitra is not responsible for the privacy practices or content of those third parties.
privacyPolicy.section4Desc: KalaMitra is a technology facilitator and does not directly manufacture, sell, or ship products. We are not responsible for any disputes, losses, or damages arising from transactions between buyers and sellers. In case of any issues, you may be provided with the artisan's contact for direct resolution.

cookiePolicy.title: Cookies Policy
cookiePolicy.subtitle: Understanding how we use cookies to improve your experience.
cookiePolicy.desc1: KalaMitra may use basic cookies or analytics tools to improve platform performance and user experience. These cookies do not collect sensitive personal data and are only used for essential site functionality and analytics.
cookiePolicy.desc2: By using this website, you consent to the use of such cookies. You can control or delete cookies through your browser settings, but some features of the site may not function properly if cookies are disabled.
cookiePolicy.desc3: KalaMitra does not use cookies for advertising or third-party marketing purposes.
